CPRED.notlocalized: This section is not yet localized.
CPRED.dierollcommandhint: Defaults to d10x10. Adjust if you want to remove exploding (d10)
CPRED.gmalwayswhisperhint: If checked, any roll made on a NPC character sheet is always hidden.
CPRED.usesimplecombathint: Enables the Combat Setup tab on the character sheet, allowing manual entry of weapon and gear stats on the character, and allowing these values to populate the action buttons on the Combat tab. Can be used on it's own or in concert with the item based combat setup.
CPRED.useitembasedcombathint: Enables a system where adding items to the Cyberware, Weapons, and Gear tabs populates the buttons on the Combat tab. Can be used on it's own or in concert with the simple combat setup.
CPRED.showinventoryhint: Unchecking this will completely disable inventory management of cyberware, weapons, and gear. In their place, a simple text based system of tracking inventory will be presented to the player. Note that unchecking this will also disable the item based combat setup.
CPRED.armorheading: Armor (Important: Armor closest to your skin should be first, with next closest second, and so on. Temporary cover, like a car, may also be added at the end.)
CPRED.armorstacknote: Note: As the jumpstart kit does not have rules for armor stacking, this system uses the stacking rules from previous editions. To play with only jumpstart kit rules, only count the highest armor on the list and disregard all others.
CPRED.deathsaverolllabela: Death save. If you roll under your body of
CPRED.deathsaverolllabelb: , you live. Each future roll takes a cumulative penalty.
CPRED.encounterblackicewithspeedy: Encounter Black Ice - With Speedy Gonzalez
CPRED.initiativerolldetail: Initiative is rolled using the encounter system. The formula is Roll + REF - Health Penalty. REF is added as a tie breaker.
CPRED.itemcombatsection: Item Combat Rolls - These are created by going through your Weapons inventory tab.
CPRED.logheader: Below is a record of all item mods applied to this character. See Stat Setup tab, item mod column, for totals.
CPRED.name: Name
CPRED.reputationchecklabela: Reputation check. If you roll under your reputation of
CPRED.setbygm: These settings are set by the GM in system settings:
CPRED.simplecombatsection: Simple Combat Rolls - These are set on the Combat Setup tab
CPRED.underconstruction: This area is under construction and may not behave as expected.
